body.name: iwoly Cordless Vacuum Cleaner Rechargeable with 2200mAh Detachable Battery, 18000Pa Cyclone Vacuum with HEPA Filter, Lightweight Portable Handheld Stick Vacuum for Hard Floor Car Cleaning

features: 【Strong 18kPa Suction & Motorized Brush Head】With a 150W motor and 18000 Pa suction power, the iwoly C150 cordless stick vacuum cleaner spins fine dust away. It has a motorized led floor head, suitable for picking up crumbs after dinner, combing stray hairs in the bathroom, or quickly refreshing floors before guests arrive.

【Detachable 2200mAh Battery & 3 Suction Modes】Powered by a lithium-ion battery, it runs up to 35 minutes in eco mode, 25 minutes in normal mode, and 20 minutes in high mode. The two buttons make it easy to switch between modes and start. The 150W main body has LED indicators that show the remaining battery power and suction modes.

【Multi-purpose 】Owning one gives you a cordless stick vacuum and a cordless handheld vacuum. With multi-functional accessories, you can reach under low furniture or up high to clean curtains, ceiling moldings, and light fixtures. Disconnect the power unit and use it as a handheld vacuum for stairs, corners, car seats, upholstery and other above-the-floor jobs.

【High-Efficiency HEPA Filtration System】Equipped with a 4-stage sealed cyclone filtration system that collects fine dust with a HEPA filter and locks dirt debris in a dust cup. Regularly cleaning the filters and sponges will prevent weak suction and blockages.

【3 Charging Methods for 4 Hours Quick Charge】When you're not using the machine, you can charge it at a convenient charging station. You can charge the battery in or out of the vacuum. Charge takes 4 hours and the battery lasts 35 minutes.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ✅ If suction become weak or vacuum cleaner stop working, check whether the battery needs charging, ✅ Check if there is any blockage in tube, or roller brush is tangled by hair, ✅ Check if the dustbin, strainer or filters is full of dust. The filters are washable, please leave them dry before re-installing; replace the filter if it's worn out or broken, ✅ If you have any questions about the product, please don't hesitate to contact iwoly Customer Support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 5 IN 1 LIGHTWEIGHT CORDLESS VACUUM CLEANER Since our founding, we here at iwoly have had a mission: to provide high-quality products that improve our customers' quality of life, all at the lowest costs possible. The lightweight yet powerful iwoly Cordless Stick Vacuum is great for cleaning hardwood floor, upholstery, stairs, car and for quickly picking up dry spills, like rice or cereal, off a bare floor and the hard-to-reach area effortless. Advantage 1: "THREE POWER MODES" -Large capacity lithium battery inside delivers up to an outstanding running time up to 35mins. Advantage 2: "DETACHABLE BATTERY" -The battery can be removed from main dody, and can be charged and replaced separately. Advantage 3: "ADJUSTABLE WANDS" -2 detachable wands could be adjusted into different height for your need, allowing you clean the hard-to-reach area effortless. Advantage 4: "NEWLY-UPGRADED POWER BRUSH" -Improved motor and LED lights make the motorized floor head more stable. Advantage 5: "STAINLESS STEEL FILTER" -It is easier to wash and has a longer service life than a plastic honeycomb filter.

CORDLESS STICK VACUUM CLEANER 3 Power modes Portable cordless vacuum cleaner equipped with powerful 150W motor and 3 speed levels lets you freely switch between high mode 18 KPa(20 minutes), normal mode 13 KPa(25 Minutes), eco mode 10 KPa(35 Minutes). Wireless vaccum cleaner is suit any task on any floor type. You can rapidly clean hardwood floors, low pile carpets, marble hard floors, stairs, beds, curtains, the interior of your car etc. Clean under the furniture The motorized brush head of this stick vacuum cleaner can be placed flat, making it easy to clean under the sofa, bed, and other low pieces of furniture. With LED lights, this vacuum cleaner can freely trace all kinds of fine dust under the furniture and other debris that can be lost in the dark. Vacuum the Stairs Removing the wands, floor vacuum can be freely converted to a handheld vacuum. Lightweight main body is easy to maneuver. As a portable vacuum cleaner, it is easy to clean stairs, cars, and more.
Upgrated LED Motorized Brush LED electric brush head can easily clean up the dust and debris on hardwood floors, tile floors, low pile carpets and car mats.

CORDLESS HANDHELD VACUUM CLEANER Crevice Tool The compact design is more suitable for cleaning the corners of the room. Adjustable Extension Tube You can use 1 or 2 extension wands to meet your various needs to clean your space. Upholstery Nozzle Remove the bristles by pushing the red button. You can use it on all upholstered furniture such as bed, sofa, chairs with flat-woven fabric. Dusting Brush Soft bristles lift dust from flat surfaces and furniture. The soft brush is also very helpful for cleaning fine dust in the gap between the car seat.

One-click bin emptying Large-capacity dust cup can be easily emptied. The washable components include sponge filter, metal filter and high-density HEPA filter. Before installing again, please make sure that the filters are completely dry. 4 Hours Fast Charge 2200 mAh large capacity battery can be removed for charging which allows you to simply plug in only the battery for charging and store the rest of the vacuum in a closet or the wall bracket. Wall-mounted Storage Neatly store the machine and 2 accessories in the convenient storage dock. Keep your home tidy and organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Took a chance and love it!
reviews.reviewText: "Efficient and Versatile Cordless Vacuum: A Cleaning Essential!"Simplfied my cleaning routine with its impressive suction power that effortlessly handles various surfaces. Its cordless design and lightweight build make it convenient to use in every corner of my home.The reliable battery life, quick charging, and easy maintenance add to its appeal, ensuring hassle-free cleaning sessions. Its durability has proven it to be a long-lasting investment.In summary, it excels in performance, convenience, and durability, making it a must-have for efficient and stress-free cleaning tasks.Pros: Impressive suction, cordless convenience, reliable battery, easy maintenance, durable build.Recommendation: Highly recommended for those seeking an efficient and reliable cordless vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its a $80 CORDLESS vacuum
reviews.reviewText: Reading through the 4-star reviews, I'm honestly not sure why they aren't 5 star for the price-point and for what you get. One comment mentioned "cheaply made", which is what prompted me to write this review.To start, we have a Bissel that was $200 or so and it works great. Honestly just as good if not better than our Dyson and its about half the weight. We were looking for something for small cleanup jobs and something that could be handheld and lightweight for upholstery.We purchased this vacuum on sale for around $80 since we didn't like having to whip out the Bissel for small cleanups. We tried it as soon as we bought it and was honestly very surprised at how much stuff it picked up AFTER vacuuming already! Its super lightweight, easy on the wrists, it has a controllable suction level which is something i didn't know we needed; making it perfect for rugs and mats.To address the "cheaply made" comment: the first thing i noticed about little vacuum was that it felt like it cost upwards of $300 easily. The materials seem like very good quality aluminum was used. Even the plastic attachments feel sturdy. Oh and its so quiet, you could have a conversation while vacuuming easily.I took it for a test run for about 15 - 20 minutes or so after a full charge and the battery level didn't move. In that time it picked up a bunch of stuff ranging from indoor rugs, outdoor rugs, carpet, tile and even the dirt that gets stuck in the sliding door tracks.Overall, a great buy and honestly a must have when you need a vacuum but don't want to unravel the cord and have to plug it into different outlets every time you run out of cord. My only negative that I noticed is that it does statically charge things quite easily. After vacuuming the couch, i noticed when moving around I would get shocked for some time afterwards. That's not worth docking a star in my opinion though. This is day one though and first impressions, however so far i'm thoroughly impressed. I will update my review based on longevity, but even if this lasts me a year or two, im happy with that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works extremely well just one weakness
reviews.reviewText: This is well made simple to adjust from full vacuum to auto vac. Good suction and the vacuum does a great job on hard surfaces and is good for a quick sweep on carpets. Super lightweight there is a lot to like. It loses a star because the battery life is short. If you run at medium speed (suction) you might get 30 minutes. Again since this is a pick up the dirt and grab surface dirt/pet hair off the carpet I get 6 or 7 “runs”. I’d buy it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for🤩
reviews.reviewText: This light weight, high maneuverability, cordless vacuum is a gem! I have a large heavy vacuum I use for deep cleaning. It is extremely difficult to bring up from the basement and then clunk around the house. I wanted something convenient to use in between, as I have two adorable kittens, who seem to leave a trail of debris wherever they go. Also for high traffic areas, door mats, hallway, kitchen tile floor. It comes with a mount, which I attached right inside the basement doorway, just grab and go. Easy to empty the canister. The battery life is fine for my purposes. In love with my new little cordless vacuum…wish I had gotten it years ago! Note: it does unexpectedly well on carpets, but not for that serious deep cleaning of cat hair, ect, but that was not my expectation of this device. Happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We use it all the time. It’s very compact and lightweight. It could use a bit more suction but still does a great job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It works ok
reviews.reviewText: Vacuum arrived on time. Looks nice. Easy to put together. Battery lasts pretty well but I wish it had just a little more power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One of the best purchases I've made in my long history of being Amazon Prime. The vacuum is lightweight, easy to handle, cleans floors and carpets, and is quick to empty. I can't say enough good things about it - and for the price its worth multiples times in convenience and value. Charges quickly and easily too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this vacuum to replace a large clunky one I had and I'm pleased with the overall performance. I love that it is small and lightweight, I can definitely lift it to get high hard to reach areas. Decent suction, but not as powerful as I hoped. The only real downside I would say this vacuum has is it's battery life. I have to charge it every time after vacuuming for only about 15-20 minutes at a time. Makes things inconvenient at times but I just worked the charge times in with my cleaning and that seems to work. Definitely worth it if you're looking for something small and lightweight.

Tiene buena potencia, creo podría tener más, la uso en al nivel 2 y 3 que es su máximo, los cabezales que trae son buenos, no trae repuestos de filtro, ojalá pueda encontrarlos fácil cuando necesite cambio porque si no, estaré en problemas, aspiro interiores de la casa y como tengo gatitos es muy útil para remover el pelo de su árbol de juegos, sala y cama, es práctica porque se desmonta fácilmente, se recarga muy rápido, en general para uso doméstico bien
Soy tan felíz de ternerla, inhalambrica, super facil para usar, pocas piezas, lo único que la bateria no dura mucho pero para espacios no muy grandes es fantástica.....
The suction power of this unit is not as strong as it should be. I would like to return it and choose another make or model
Para levantar polvo está de 10, pero para algo más no sirve
Excelente aunque me llego un producto ya usado.
